info.description:
The GeoDB API focuses on getting global city and region data. Easily obtain country, region, and city data for use in your apps!
  • Filter cities by name prefix, country, location, time-zone, and even minimum population.
  • Sort cities by name, country code, elevation, and population - or any combination of these.
  • Get all country regions.
  • Get all cities in a given region.
  • Display results in multiple languages.
  • RESTful API adheres to industry best-practices, including HATEOAS-style links to facilitate paging results.
  • Backed by cloud-based load-balanced infrastructure for resiliency and performance!
  • Data is periodically refreshed from GeoNames and WikiData.

Notes:

  • Since the database is periodically updated, this may very rarely result in certain cities being marked deleted (e.g., duplicates removed). By default, endpoints returning city data will exclude cities marked deleted. However, in the unlikely event that this occurs while your app is paging through a set of affected results - and you care about the paged results suddenly changing underneath - specify includeDeleted=SINCE_YESTERDAY (or SINCE_LAST_WEEK if you're really paranoid!).

Useful Resources

  • SDKs
    • Angular, Sample App
    • Java
    • JavaScript
  • Swagger Docs
  • Usage License

path.countryId.description: An ISO-3166 country code or WikiData id

query.country.sort.description:
How to sort countries. 
Format: ±SORT_FIELD 
where SORT_FIELD = code | name
query.country.sort.name: sort

query.distanceUnit.description: The unit of distance: MI | KM
query.distanceUnit.name: distanceUnit

query.entity.namePrefix.description:
Only entities whose names start with this prefix. If languageCode is set, the prefix will be matched on the name
as it appears in that language.
query.entity.namePrefix.name: namePrefix

query.entity.namePrefixDefaultLangResult.name: namePrefixDefaultLangResults

query.includeDeleted.description: Whether to include any divisions marked deleted: ALL | SINCE_YESTERDAY | SINCE_LAST_WEEK | NONE
query.includeDeleted.name: includeDeleted

query.limit.name: limit

query.offset.description: The zero-ary offset index into the results
query.offset.name: offset

query.place.excludedCountryIds.name: excludedCountryIds

query.place.maxPopulation.description: Only places having no more than this population
query.place.maxPopulation.name: maxPopulation

query.place.minPopulation.description: Only places having at least this population
query.place.minPopulation.name: minPopulation

query.place.sort.description:
How to sort places. 
Format: ±SORT_FIELD,±SORT_FIELD 
where SORT_FIELD = countryCode | elevation | name | population
query.place.sort.name: sort

How to sort place results.

query.place.types.description: Only places for these types (comma-delimited): CITY | ADM2
query.place.types.name: types
